SELECT vwp.package_id AS widgetPackageId, IF(JSON_CONTAINS_PATH(vwp.i18n_name, 'one', '$."${language}"'), vwp.i18n_name ->> '$."${language}"', vwp.i18n_name ->> '$."en-US"') AS name, vwp.icon, vwp.cover, IF(JSON_CONTAINS_PATH(vwp.i18n_description, 'one', '$."${language}"'), vwp.i18n_description ->> '$."${language}"', vwp.i18n_description ->> '$."en-US"') AS description, vwpr.version, vwpr.release_code_bundle, vwpr.source_code_bundle, vwp.widget_body ->> '$.widgetOpenSource' as widgetOpenSource, vwp.widget_body ->> '$.templateCover' as templateCover FROM ${tablePrefix}widget_package vwp INNER JOIN ${tablePrefix}widget_package_auth_space vwpas ON vwp.package_id = vwpas.package_id AND vwpas.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN ${tablePrefix}widget_package_release vwpr ON vwp.release_id = vwpr.id AND vwpr.is_deleted = 0 WHERE vwp.release_type = 1 AND vwp.is_template = 1 AND vwpr.STATUS = 1 AND vwp.STATUS = 3 AND vwp.is_deleted = 0 AND vwpas.type = 0 ORDER BY vwpas.widget_sort

SELECT vwp.package_id AS widgetPackageId, IF(JSON_CONTAINS_PATH(vwp.i18n_name, 'one', '$."${storeListRo.language}"'), vwp.i18n_name ->> '$."${storeListRo.language}"', vwp.i18n_name ->> '$."en-US"') AS name, vwp.icon, vwp.cover, IF(JSON_CONTAINS_PATH(vwp.i18n_description, 'one', '$."${storeListRo.language}"'), vwp.i18n_description ->> '$."${storeListRo.language}"', vwp.i18n_description ->> '$."en-US"') AS description, vwpr.version, vwp.status, vwp.author_name, vwp.author_email, vwp.author_link, vwp.author_icon, vwp.package_type, vwp.release_type, IF(vwpas.type = 1, TRUE, FALSE) AS isEmpower, vwp.widget_body ->> '$.website' AS website, vwpas.widget_sort, vwpr.install_env_code, vwpr.runtime_env_code FROM ${tablePrefix}widget_package vwp INNER JOIN ${tablePrefix}widget_package_auth_space vwpas ON vwp.package_id = vwpas.package_id AND vwpas.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}widget_package_release vwpr ON vwp.release_id = vwpr.id AND vwpr.is_deleted = 0 WHERE vwp.is_deleted = 0 AND vwp.is_template = 0
AND ( ( vwp.release_type = 0 AND vwpas.type = 0 AND vwp.STATUS = 3 AND ( (vwp.owner = #{userId} AND vwpas.space_id = #{spaceId}) OR vwpas.space_id = #{spaceId}) )
OR ( vwp.release_type = 0 AND vwpas.type = 0 AND vwp.STATUS = 0 AND vwp.owner = #{userId} AND vwpas.space_id = #{spaceId} ) OR ( vwp.release_type = 0 AND vwpas.type = 0 AND vwpr.STATUS IN (0, 2) AND vwp.owner = #{userId} AND vwpas.space_id = #{spaceId} )
OR ( vwp.release_type = 0 AND vwpas.type = 1 AND vwpas.space_id = #{spaceId} ) )
AND vwp.release_type = 1 AND vwpr.STATUS = 1 AND vwp.STATUS = 3 AND vwp.is_enabled = 1
ORDER BY vwpas.widget_sort

SELECT vwpas.space_id, vum.member_name AS authorName, vu.avatar AS authorIcon, vu.uuid AS ownerUuid, vwp.owner, vum.id AS ownerMemberId FROM ${tablePrefix}widget_package vwp INNER JOIN ${tablePrefix}widget_package_auth_space vwpas ON vwp.package_id = vwpas.package_id AND vwpas.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}user vu ON vwp.owner = vu.id AND vu.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN ${tablePrefix}unit_member vum ON vum.user_id = vu.id AND vum.space_id = vwpas.space_id AND vum.is_deleted = 0 WHERE vwp.is_deleted = 0 AND vwp.release_type = 0 AND vwpas.type = 0 AND vwp.package_id = #{packageId} UNION ALL SELECT vwpas.space_id, vwp.author_name AS authorName, vwp.author_icon AS authorIcon, NULL AS ownerUuid, NULL AS owner, NULL AS ownerMemberId FROM ${tablePrefix}widget_package vwp INNER JOIN ${tablePrefix}widget_package_auth_space vwpas ON vwp.package_id = vwpas.package_id AND vwpas.is_deleted = 0 WHERE vwp.is_deleted = 0 AND vwp.release_type = 1 AND vwpas.type = 0 AND vwp.package_id = #{packageId}
